prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Francis Scott Key to Letter Rev. William Meade, Accession #6949-b, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from Kingston Galleries on July 1, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Key writes concerning their friend Randolph and his conversion to Christ, mentions that Mr. Keith and Mr. Addison will change pulpits, also comments on his faith in Christ.
